title: The Bachelorette: Jamie Doran's secret connection to Angie Kent
text:
The Bachelorette star Jamie Doran had an unlikely connection to Angie Kent long before appearing on the Channel 10 dating show, Daily Mail Australia can reveal.

During Angie's years on Gogglebox, the firefighter became close friends with one of her co-stars, Symon Lovett, who is still on the program.

Bizarrely, Jamie has not mentioned their friendship to Angie, and Symon has also pretended not to know the suitor while reacting to The Bachelorette on Gogglebox.

Surprise! The Bachelorette star Jamie Doran (right) had an unlikely connection to Angie Kent (left) long before appearing on the Channel 10 dating show, Daily Mail Australia can reveal

Photos discovered by Daily Mail Australia show Jamie and Symon travelling across Europe together in 2017.

In one picture, the pair can be seen posing alongside a tourist attraction with another friend.

But when Symon and his roommate, Adam Densten, reviewed Jamie's arrival on The Bachelorette during a recent episode of Gogglebox, he did not mention their past.

'You might as well not even be there!' he said of Jamie, who had just greeted Angie on the red carpet while holding a cute puppy.

Who knew! During Angie's years on Gogglebox, Jamie became close friends with one of her co-stars, Symon Lovett, who is still on the program Pictured: Symon and Jamie in Europe in 2017

Are they no longer friends? Bizarrely, Symon (left) pretended not to know Jamie while reacting to the dating show on Gogglebox with his roommate Adam Densten (right) recently

As Jamie started crying later in the episode, Symon yelled out, 'What!', but once again failed to acknowledge their past friendship.

Angie appeared on Gogglebox from 2015 to 2018, before leaving to join the cast of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in January.

Symon and Adam have been contributors on Gogglebox since 2015.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel 10 for comment.

Why so secretive? Jamie has not mentioned his friendship with Symon to Angie on The Bachelorette. Pictured: Angie with her Gogglebox co-star, Yvie Jones (right)

A recent trailer hinted that Jamie will drop a 'bombshell' on Wednesday's episode of The Bachelorette.

The 39-year-old takes Angie aside at the cocktail party for a private chat that soon leads to tears and an argument among the male contestants.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10

Something big is coming! A recent trailer hinted that Jamie will drop a 'bombshell' on Wednesday's episode of The Bachelorette
description: The Bachelorette firefighter Jamie Doran had an unlikely connection to Angie Kent long before appearing on the Channel 10 dating show.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
